subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Although Coach Tom Coughlin intends to limit Eli Manning and the rest of the first-team offense to 12 to 15 snaps in Thursday’s preseason finale against the Patriots, he is pushing for results.
snippet: Although Coach Tom Coughlin intends to limit Eli Manning and the rest of the first-team offense to 12 to 15 snaps in Thursday’s preseason finale against the Patriots, he is pushing for results.
